Ad Text:
Company Description


Join the team redefining how the world experiences design.

Hey, g'day, mabuhay, kia ora, 你好, hallo, vítejte!
Thanks for stopping by. We know job hunting can be time-consuming, so let’s get straight to the point.

Where and how you can work

Our flagship campus is in Sydney, with additional spaces in Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, and Adelaide. You have the flexibility to work from the office, home, or a mix of both—it’s your choice. We trust our Canvanauts to choose the balance that empowers them and their team to achieve their goals.

Job Description


What you’d be doing in this role

As Canva scales, change is part of our DNA. While your role will evolve over time, here’s a flavour of what you’ll be working on when you start:

Leading Product Analytics Engineering: Own and lead the Analytics Engineering function for the Product Org, with Product AEs reporting to you and the team expected to grow over time.

Driving Analytics Architecture of the Future: Define, own, and evolve Canva’s Product Analytics Engineering architecture, including modular data domains, semantic layers, metrics systems, and AI-ready foundations.

Elevating Analytics Engineering (AE) Craft: Set clear standards and best practices for analytics engineering across Product, and coach AEs across levels to consistently deliver high-quality, scalable data assets.

Partnering Across Product & Data: Work closely with Product Managers, Data Scientists, Engineers, and Platform teams to translate complex product needs into robust, reusable analytics solutions.

Balancing Strategy and Delivery: Combine long-term architectural thinking with pragmatic execution, ensuring AE effort is focused on the highest-impact Product initiatives.

Acting as a Technical Leader: Be the senior escalation point for complex analytics problems and represent Analytics Engineering perspectives in Product and Data leadership forums.

Enabling Product Decisions: Ensure analytics foundations enable product discovery, experimentation, launches, and long-term strategy, helping teams confidently understand user behaviour, product performance, and the impact of their decisions.

Hands-on Where It Matters Most: Get actively involved in complex or high-leverage analytics engineering work, while setting the technical direction for the team.

You're probably a match if…

You have extensive experience across Analytics Engineering, Data Engineering, or Software Engineering roles.

You’ve led and coached Analytics Engineering teams, including managing senior engineers and growing teams.

You’re deeply experienced with modern data platforms and tooling (e.g. SQL-based warehouses such as Snowflake, dbt-style transformations, orchestration, and semantic layers).

You have strong opinions (weakly held) — backed by experience — on data modelling, analytics architecture, and platform scalability and are eager to try new approaches.

You’re comfortable operating at the intersection of technical depth, people leadership, and strategy.

You thrive on collaboration and can communicate clearly with both highly technical partners and senior non-technical stakeholders.

You care deeply about data quality, reliability, performance, and cost efficiency.

About the team

Analytics Engineering sits within Canva’s broader Data ecosystem. The Product Analytics Engineering team partners closely with Product, Design and Engineering to ensure Canva’s product decisions are powered by trusted, timely, and scalable data foundations.

What's in it for you?

Achieving our crazy big goals motivates us to work hard—and we do—but you’ll experience lots of moments of magic, connectivity, and fun woven throughout life at Canva. Here’s a taste of what’s on offer:

Equity packages: We want our success to be yours too.

Inclusive parental leave policy: Supporting all parents and carers.

Annual Vibe & Thrive allowance: Supporting your wellbeing, social connection, office setup, and more.

Flexible leave options: Empowering you to recharge and take time for what matters most.

Other stuff to know

We value unique experiences and skills. If you don’t meet every requirement but feel passionate about this role, we’d still love to hear from you.

We make hiring decisions based on your experience, skills, and passion, as well as how you can enhance Canva and its culture. Let us know your pronouns and any reasonable adjustments you may need during the interview process.

Let’s make an impact together!

Job Description


Join the team redefining how the world experiences design.
Hey, g'day, mabuhay, kia ora, 你好, hallo, vítejte!
Thanks for stopping by. We know job hunting can be a little time consuming and you're probably keen to find out what's on offer, so we'll get straight to the point.

Where and how you can work
Our flagship campus is in Sydney. We also have a campus in Melbourne and co-working spaces in Brisbane, Perth and Adelaide. But you have choice in where and how you work, we trust our Canvanauts to choose the balance that empowers them and their team to achieve their goals.

What you'd be doing in this role
As Canva scales, change continues to be part of our DNA. But we like to think that's all part of the fun. So this will give you the flavour of the type of things you'll be working on when you start, but this will likely evolve.

At the moment, this role is focused on:

Leading the development of Infra Analytics data services, ensuring complex infrastructure insights are intuitive and accessible for stakeholders across Canva.

Architecting resilient, high-performance pipelines to orchestrate massive telemetry streams, maintaining the same scalability standards as our production systems.

Driving the technical strategy for data warehouse performance, ensuring efficient query execution and cost-effective storage for large-scale infra datasets.

Defining and promoting data modeling standards across the Infra Supergroup to ensure a unified and disciplined approach to data architecture.

Designing and maintaining a robust Infra semantic layer to guarantee a "single source of truth" for metrics and dimensions across all BI and analytical tools.

Partnering with cross-functional teams to lead the delivery of complex, high-impact projects from ideation to production.

Championing engineering best practices, with a focus on performance, scalability, reliability, and code quality.

You're probably a match if:

You have a proven track record of building scalable data solutions to solve complex, high-impact business challenges.

You’re fluent in advanced SQL and bring deep, hands-on experience in modern data modelling.

You’re proficient with Snowflake and AWS, and experienced with data transformation and orchestration tools (e.g. dbt, Airflow).

You are comfortable coding in Python.

You lead with an ownership mindset, communicate with clarity and influence, and thrive in collaborative, fast-moving environments.

A plus if you’re passionate about exploring emerging AI/ML opportunities.

About the team

The Infrastructure Analytics team serves as the stewards of Canva’s infrastructure analytics data, operating at the critical intersection of reliability, efficiency, and growth. Our mission is to transform raw infrastructure data into accessible, actionable insights that empower Canvanauts to make data-driven decisions regarding infrastructure optimization and scale. As the Center of Data Excellence for the Infra Supergroup, we don't just report on metrics but define the analytics landscape by managing the specialized data services, building scalable pipelines, and creating innovative analytical products. We act as strategic thought leaders and proactive problem-solvers, ensuring that data is a transformative force that drives Canva’s engineering innovation and continuous operational excellence.

What’s in it for you?
Achieving our crazy big goals motivates us to work hard — and we do — but you'll experience lots of moments of magic, connectivity and fun woven throughout life at Canva, too. We also offer a range of benefits to set you up for every success in and outside of work.

Here’s a taste of what’s on offer:
• Equity packages – we want our success to be yours too
• Inclusive parental leave policy that supports all parents & carers
• An annual Vibe & Thrive allowance to support your wellbeing, social connection, office setup & more
• Flexible leave options that empower you to be a force for good, take time to recharge and support you personally

Check out lifeatcanva.com for more info.

Other stuff to know
We make hiring decisions based on your experience, skills and passion, as well as how you can enhance Canva and our culture. When you apply, please tell us the pronouns you use and any reasonable adjustments you may need during the interview process.

We celebrate all types of skills and backgrounds at Canva so even if you don't feel like your skills quite match what's listed above – we still want to hear from you!

Please note that interviews are conducted virtually.
